configure

public void configure(IndexEngineConfig config)
Description copied from interface: PlugableSearchIndex
Plugin has a last chance to enforce engine compabilities required to index functioning. This method is being called just befor index creation and may override settings done on SearchFactory level.

Specified by:
configure in interface PlugableSearchIndex<NGramIndex,java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String>

createIndexCompatibilityToken

public java.lang.Object createIndexCompatibilityToken(java.lang.Integer indexConfig)
Description copied from interface: PlugableSearchIndex
Due to usage of generic extractors and filters. A some token is required to distinguish different custom indexes. Token object should be compatible with cache serializer.

Specified by:
createIndexCompatibilityToken in interface PlugableSearchIndex<NGramIndex,java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String>
